channel.title: iServer - We want your opinions - Poll Two
channel.description:
This thread is all about what you'd like in [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,178983.0.html]iServer[/url]. That is a long thread but I'd recommend you read it.
[size=15pt][u][i][b] Second Poll[/b][/i][/u][/size]
I logged onto RuneScape to find a very cool interface. From here, I meet a level 19 asking to go the wild (later he backstabs me and I kill him) Anyway, on the way there we go to Varrock. I found it very interesting and thought it looked very cool.
So it came to my mind. Should I spend a little less than a month with Cache Editing (Can't add anything personal anyway), or spend around four to five months creating the perfect RuneScape like private server. Sure, we have some of iClient and iServer done, but nothing more than a couple of weeks. If we created a 465 client and server, we'd release it to the public to play on. Then we'd work out the bugs and then release it as open source. The problem with that is we'd have to rewrite a server from scratch. Would it be hard? Of course, we'd probably give up. But it would almost be harder to get all the models and add them into a 377.. Discuss.
[size=15pt][u][i][b] First Poll[/b][/i][/u][/size]
[b]RuneScape Interface > My Interface[/b]
We're still on Cache Repacking (Big surprise hmm :rolleyes:).. But we are going at it. For the last two days I've been working on a website and no so much the Cache, but soon we'll be back into Editing 100%.
This three day span poll is about which interface you would like. The one that I created (some credits to Mr Quater for the text box), or using the one that's exactly like RuneScape. We'll probably add Clan Chat if we get enough people that want it, but until then we'll make something else for that extra tab ;)
So, which interface would you like and why?
[size=15pt][u][b]One[/b][/u][/size]
[IMG]http://www.iserver.nationvoice.com/pikchurs/pikchur.gif[/img]
(I'll get the full interface soon, but just take this for now)
[b]Or..[/b]
[size=15pt][u][b]Two[/b][/u][/size]
[IMG]http://img74.imageshack.us/img74/1017/goodderuu5.jpg[/img]
I made everything except the text box, which was from R00nScape.
Also, tell us why you pick either one.

item.title: iServer - We want your opinions - Poll Two
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“O M G, post:9, topic:131388”]^ yasrsly halp pls

It’s looking like absolutely no one likes my interface

Anyway that’s why we wanted this poll, apparently what I thought would look good no one else did.[/quote]

I would help you with the packets but this is just a 377 with a new edited cache.

Read full topic

jfyi I coded DeathScape (not the one right now, I had a server b4 that one, GrimScape (i think my friend deleted his copy, cause I deleted mine) and ReaperScape, now known Reaper Land)… Been succesful, cause I’m a code java coder, and I’m working on Dragon Flight, case of ReenScape… I have been modifying 'caure reenscape came F*d up… they stink at coding, rofl.

Ohh if you need anyhelp just tell me. For something thats going to help everyone, I would like to join. MoparScape must advance into a new era of coding.

I’ll code in Java or (for webpages) HTML / JAVASCRIPT… =]

remember just pm me for any help. (and anyone else reading this, need help pm me. but if ur not that important I won’t give it a 110% effort, =P)
